title: Lakers, Clippers, Kawhi Leonard, and Kevin Durant
itunes:title: Lakers, Clippers, Kawhi Leonard, and Kevin Durant
description:
With the Los Angeles Lakers now having cap space to sign another star, Colin gives possible scenarios. He explains why he would feel bad for the Clippers if Kawhi Leonard decides to sign with the Lakers. Also Colin says Kevin Durant leaving the Warriors to prove something is like Tom Brady leaving the Patriots. Guests include Chris Broussard, Chris Haynes, Chris Mannix, and Jason McIntyre. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
